data_table.description: The information published as 'Adverse Events and their Association with Treatment Regimens in the DCCT' (for published results see: <a href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8722064?ordinalpos=2&itool=EntrezSystem2.PEntrez.Pubmed.Pubmed_ResultsPanel.Pubmed_DefaultReportPanel.Pubmed_RVDocSum"> PMID 8722064</a>) is represented in nine datasets (prefixed with: m9-). M9exdka is one of four datasets representing variables used to analyze the occurrence rate of adverse events in CSII pump versus MDI users (both user groups are part of the experimental/intensive treatment group). M9exdka data focus on occurrences of diabetic ketoacidosis.

variable.name: D_STD
variable.description: Number of days on standard treatment

variable.name: EV_PUMP
variable.description: Number of infections while on pump

variable.name: EV_MDI
variable.description: Number of infections while on MDI

variable.name: EV_STD
variable.description: Number of infections while on standard treatment

variable.name: R_STD
variable.description: Event rate while on standard treatment

variable.name: TEVENT
variable.description: Sum of events for total combined regimen

variable.name: I_PUMP
variable.description: Indicator - events occurred while on pump

variable.name: I_MDI
variable.description: Indicator - events occurred while on MDI

variable.name: I_STD
variable.description: Indicator - events occurred while on standard treatment

variable.name: AYSTD
variable.description: Indicator - any time on standard treatment
